title: Spherical to Cartesian Converter | Convert (ρ, θ, φ) to (x, y, z)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: x = ρ · sin(φ) · cos(θ) y = ρ · sin(φ) · sin(θ) z = ρ · cos(φ)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: x = r · sin(θ) · cos(φ) y = r · sin(θ) · sin(φ) z = r · cos(θ)
